snippet: It was unclear whether Robbie Rogers was planning to retire from soccer or simply take a break from playing, though the emotional toll of his decision to come out was evident.
abstract: Robbie Rogers, former midfielder for United States national soccer team, reveals in blog post that he is gay; it is unclear whether Rogers is planning to retire from sport or simply take a break, though emotional toll of his decision to come out is evident.
lead_paragraph: It was unclear whether Robbie Rogers was planning to retire from soccer or simply take a break from playing, though the emotional toll of his decision to come out was evident.

headline.seo: Robbie Rogers, a U.S. Soccer Player, Reveals He Is Gay
headline.main: U.S. Soccer Player Opens Up About Being Gay
headline.print_headline: Former Member of U.S. Soccer Team Reveals He Is Gay
